$ZIM for you divy peeps. Who is trying to accumulate steady income streams.  Here's the top 3 divy stocks I like. I'm not some guru so take it or leave it.  $ZIM
Zim solid company. Steady profits. Around 70percent divys yearly. Avg 3 bucks a share. With special divy for first quarter every year per company mandate.
Pbr is a gas company. Around 11 per share. Paying about 50 percent divy. Ok wned half by the brazil govt. So they want to keep divys coming into their spending budgets.

Finally arr. It's a reit.  Stays at around 6 bucks per share. Mainly because it pays divys monthly.  Pretty steady at .10 per share. That's 20 percent per year. Makes compounding build up fast if reinvesting divys. Instead of quarterly. Each month get more and more to increase growth over the 20 percent.
If your steady day trading and throwing those profits into these.  You'll be sitting pretty at end of year.   Ideas from a lowly retail trader.
